section.p: Version 2.2 or later for smartphones, and version 3.0 or later for tablets.
If I save a document or image file in the app on my Android device, where is it stored?
Document or image files saved in the app are stored in your specified download folder or in the default /sdcard/Download folder.
If I save a document or image file in the app on my iOS device, where is it stored?

Which KYOCERA printers and MFPs are supported?
The complete list appears at the end of this document.
Are you planning to add support for additional KYOCERA printer and MFP models?
Yes. The app will be updated occasionally to support new KYOCERA printing devices.
Can I use this app to print to non-KYOCERA printers and MFPs?
The app will not work with other brand printers and MFPs.
Are there any differences in the KYOCERA Mobile Print for tablet device versus mobile phone?
The layout is slightly different to take best advantage of the different screen sizes, but the features are the same for both.
